model

Class ABall

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ABall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreathingBall, ColorChangingBall, CurveBall, DirectChangingBall, GostBall, StraightBall, WanderBall

    public abstract class ABall
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This is a abstract ball class
    Since:
    2017-09-07
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Qingyue Liu, Haoshan Zou

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected javax.swing.JPanel canvas
      canvas is the panel for the ball word.
      protected java.awt.Color color
      color is the color of a ball.
      protected java.awt.Point loc
      loc is the center point of a ball.
      protected int radius
      radius is the radius of a ball.
      protected java.awt.Point vel
      vel is the velocity of a ball which include the x-axis velocity and y-axis velocity.
